div.p: The study group received funding from Mundipharma GmbH, a pharmaceutical company, to carry out the study, which may be considered a potential conflict of interest. Mundipharma GmbH was not involved in the design of the study, data collection, data analysis or interpretation, or in the publication of the study results. Mundipharma GmbH provided financial support, recruited training participants, and organized the training settings. AB and MH were heads of the research project. EM AR and AD received funding. IS conducted one training in the project and received travel compensation.
